comment: If you struggle with statistics or math in general take professor Mashburn's course! His lectures are easy to understand and as long as you keep up with the weekly homework, (which is not time consuming or a headache) you will be on track to get a good grade on the exams.Exams are in person and you get one page of notes for each one, there are 3.

Dr. Mashburn was easy to work with all semester and was very understanding about personal things outside of class. Attendance isn't mandatory but he does do "Concept Checks" at the end of each class. He drops your lowest four so you can afford to miss at least 4 days. He spends time trying to help understand the concepts rather than just memorize.
